name: Apescapists
description:
Basic controls:

  W                                            LMB - Shoot
A S D - directional movement                 RMB - Dash / Smash

P - pause

Coco solo abilities:
1. Recall
2. Recall
3. Ape Strike
4. Bat Strike

Coco & Michael Duo Abilities:
1. Bonobo Throw
2. Gorilla Charge
3. Spin To Win
4. Roar

Recall - Michael starts rushing towards Coco, reuniting when they connect.
Ape Strike - Coco dashes from enemy to enemy, hitting them and ruining their haircuts( :frowning: ). After hitting all the enemies in the area Coco becomes hidden and cannot be attacked.
Bat Strike - Coco uses her bat to damage all the enemies in a direction.

Bonobo throw - Michael flings Coco towards the pointed direction, separating the duo and dealing damage to the enemy hit.
Gorilla Charge - Michael charges to the spot Coco tells him to, disconnecting the duo and dealing damage in the landing area.
Spin To Win - Coco and Michael start spinning furiously, creating a storm and dealing damage around them.
Roar - Michael lets out a terrifying roar, damaging enemies in its path.
